column4: na fa ɔdasanyi ne nsaano kyerɛw do dɛ

column2: "na mebɛma adasefo anokwafo edzi me dase
"Na mokɔr nkɔnhyɛnyibaa no ho  na onyinsenii woo ɔbabanyin. Nna EWURADZE see me dɛ
column4: , #8.3NKƆNHYƐNYIBAA: Nkɔnhyɛnyibaa no yɛ Isaia noara ne yer."

column2: "osiandɛ ansaana abofra no bohu mbrɛ wosi ka
column5: Asiriahen bɔsoa Damaskɔs ahonya na Samaria asadze edzi n’enyim akɔ."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ me bio dɛ
column4: "Susuampa dɛ ɔman yi apow Siloa nsu a ɔpem nyaa
column5: na hɔn ho asɛpɛw Rezin nye Remalia ba no ho yi;"
EWURADZE dze esutsen no mu nsu a ɔyɛ dzen na ɔdɔɔ so no reba hɔn do
column7: na ɔbɛba abɔfow n’esuka nyina na ɔatra n’esukɔn nyina do;"

column3: na oeyir etwa mu akɔ; obodu kɔn ho mpo; na n’atsaban mu han bɛhyɛ w’asaase ne tɛtɛr nyina ma

column4: na wɔbɔdwerew hom; ekyirekyir asaasedofo nyina
column5: hom nyɛ aso: hom nsiesie homho mma ɔko

column3: na ɔbɛyɛ kwa; hom nka dza hom pɛ
column4: naaso orinngyina: osiandɛ Onyankopɔn nye hɛn wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze tum kɛse kasaa dɛm kyerɛɛ me
column4: dɛ mma mennantsew ɔman yi no kwan do
column7: "Mma hom mmfrɛ dza ɔman yi frɛ no Tsirdo apam nyina dɛ Tsirdo apam a; eso mma hom nnsuro dza wosuro

column3: ɔno na hom mbu no krɔnkrɔn; na ɔno na ɔnyɛ hom suro

column4: na patatsir botan ama Israel efiefi ebien nyina
column5: na ɔayɛ apafir na efir ama hɔn a wɔtse Jerusalɛm nyina."

column3: sɔw nkyerɛkyerɛ no ano wɔ m’esuafo mu."
mobɔtweɔn EWURADZE a ɔdze n’enyim suma Jakob fi
emi ɔnye mba a EWURADZE dze ama me yɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze wɔ Israel mu
column4: ofi dɔm EWURADZE a ɔtse Zion bepɔw do no hɔ."

column3: Hom mbisa asamamfrɛfo nye esumamfo a wosu twɔtwɔw na wɔyɛ huhuhuhu no a: aso onntwar dɛ ɔman bi wobisa hɔn Nyame hɔ adze? Aso wombisa atseasefo ho asɛm wɔ ewufo hɔ?"

column2: "Hom ndzi mbra no nye adasesɛm no do! Sɛ wɔannkasa dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse yi a
column3: ɔnodze adzekyee bi nnyi hɔ ma hɔn."

column4: na ɔkɔm adze hɔn: na ɔbɛba dɛ ɔkɔm nya dze hɔn a
column6: na wɔadom hɔn hen na hɔn Nyankopɔn
column7: na wɔaama hɔn enyi akyerɛ sor."

column4: ahokyer nye sum nye ahoguan kusuwwyɛ nye yi; na wobosun hɔn egu sum kebii no mu."
